name: Cthonic Curator
description:
Present
Verb
To give, provide, or make something known

You play as a museum curator, and must make decisions about where to place difference art pieces to satisify the different visitors that use your museum.

Your visitors, however, are visitors from another realm, and you have no idea what could satisfy their demonic preferences.

Made for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam

Credits for assets used are included with the game files.
